about_the_game:
Murder Next Room is a multiplayer roleplaying game where you and other players are trapped in a place where a murder happened and one or more of them could be the killers. The police has been called but they're far away and will reach the location in the morning. In the mean time you can try to investigate who committed the murder, try survive the night or just hang out with the others. You can try to report the killer(s) but there is no guarantee that the phones will be working.

  • Multiplayer: Play with your friends or other people.
  • Role-play: Anyone could be the killer and its up to you who you trust.
  • Sabotage: Electricity, Water and Telephone line can be sabotaged and fixed.
  • Immersive Experience: Realistic graphics, sounds and illumination will create a totally immersive experience.
  • Endless Replayability: Wide set of match configurations for random item spawns, unpredictable events and roleplay options, every playthrough brings a unique experience.

Life system
Every player has 3 factors to pay attention during the match:
  • Health
    • Main factor of the life system.
    • If the Health bar runs out, the player dies.
  • Hunger
    • Hunger bar drains over time.
    • Players can eat food to refill their Hunger bar.
    • If the Hunger bar runs out, the player's Health gets drained over time.
  • Thirst
    • Thirst bar drains on physical exercise such as sprinting and vaulting.
    • Players can drink beverages or water to refill their Thirst bar.
    • If the Thirst bar runs out, the player will be unable to sprint and vault.
